member.summary: Event handler that gets called after usee select a cell

member.name: T:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid
member.summary: Implements a Grid control base. DataRowSource is a list of row objects - if it changes in separate thread then it is row's responsibility to synchronize accessors as this grid makes no assumptions about thread safety

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.SendDataSourceChangedNotification(System.Object)
member.summary: Notifies grid that data/metadata(such as comment) has changed for specified row, and row has to be redrawn if it is visible. If row is null the grid is rebuilt. Pass null when rows where added or deleted to/from grid data source Returns true if grid was rebuilt when row was visible or null. This method is NOT THREAD SAFE and runs in GUI thread. This method does call aggregation, that is - when this method is called many times within timespan it will rebuild grid only once at the end.

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.SelectRow(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds row to selection. If row is not in grid's source rowset then it will never be highlighted in grid (because it never shows in grid then)

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.UnSelectRow(System.Object)
member.summary: Deletes row from selection. Returns true if row was selected

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.IsRowSelected(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns true if row is selected in grid

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.SelectAllRows
member.summary: Selects all rows. The method will not select any rows if SelectAllRowsAllowed is false. Number of rows selected

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.UnSelectAllRows
member.summary: Unselects all rows

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.TryFindColumnByID(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to find a column by its' id or returns null

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.Configure(NFX.Environment.IConfigSectionNode)
member.summary: Reads column configuration from config node that should contain [grid] sub elemnt/s. The id attribute should either match or be absent

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.PersistConfiguration(NFX.Environment.ConfigSectionNode)
member.summary: Persists column configuration to config node. [grid] subnode will be created under specified node pr reused if one already exists

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.GetRowHeight(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns height for a row, if row==null then header row assumed (where column titles are displayed). This implementation returns Data/Header RowHeight properties. Override to do conditional row measurements depending on row instance

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.BuildDefaultStyle(NFX.WinForms.Controls.Style)
member.summary: Builds default style for data cells in non-selected rows

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.BuildDefaultHeaderStyle(NFX.WinForms.Controls.Style)
member.summary: Builds default style for header row cells - column titles

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.BuildDefaultSelectedStyle(NFX.WinForms.Controls.Style)
member.summary: Builds default style for data cells in selected rows

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.DispatchCellSelection(NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.CellElement)
member.summary: Dispatches appropriate events and performs row selection in the grid

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.BeginBatchChange
member.summary: Marks the beginning of the series of changes that are going to be performed on the grid so the grid does not have to be rebuild unnecessarily many times. The complementary method is EndBatchChange() that does rebuild the grid IF it is needed. These methods respect call nesting, so only the last call to EndBatchChange() would result in rebuild

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.EndBatchChange
member.summary: Complementary method for BeginBatchChange()

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.RepositionColumn(NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Column,NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Column)
member.summary: Repositions one column to the position of another

member.summary: Copies selection to clipboard

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.ResetRowHeight
member.summary: Reset data row hight to its original value it had prior to changing with assignment to DataRowHeight

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.GridKit.Grid.LayoutSubControls
member.summary: Performs layout of sub controls, such as element host, scroll bars etc..

member.name: M:NFX.WinForms.Controls.Style.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Control,NFX.WinForms.Controls.Style)
member.summary: Creates a style in a context of control and parent. If an attribute is not defined in this instance it is tried to be fetched from parent. If parent is not available then control context is used if it is not null for some properties like Font and BGColor. Both context and parent may be null

member.summary: Copies attributes from another style
